column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I dig the tapas bar experience and was pretty darn excited to try Ba-Ba-Reeba.  (Not to mention
column2: I really enjoy saying the name out loud!)  When me and my main squeeze got there
column4: we were seated immediately on their super-cute patio area
column5: which is adorable namely due to the hanging lanterns strung across it.
